test-set.name: xp-striding-roaming-free-rangingA||file:///D:/Projects/AbraSoft/__HG-ALL__/Exselt/Tests/_Test-Repository/XT3/tests/sandp/xp-striding-roaming-free-ranging/_xp-striding-roaming-free-rangingA-test-set.xml
test-set.description: CP: Striding, RP: Roaming, RS: Free-ranging Any step expression selecting streamed nodes on the following(-sibling) or preceding(-sibling) axis is roaming and free-ranging

test-case.name: xp-striding-roaming-free-rangingA001
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: roaming, RS: free-ranging Base expression: following::foo Separators: / With axes: any With node types: any Invariant: none

test-case.name: xp-striding-roaming-free-rangingA002
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: roaming, RS: free-ranging Base expression: following::ex:foo Separators: / With axes: any With node types: any Invariant: none

test-case.name: xp-striding-roaming-free-rangingA003
